rules_text:
Trample, reach
[i]Top Tier Training[/i] – Whenever Etie, Fit and Fierce attacks, if another attacking creature has greater power than Etie, put X +1/+1 counters on her equal to the difference. If two ore more counters were put on her this way, untap her.
[i]Hard Work[/i] – {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Etie: Add X {G}.
